feed.title: PlikShare Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for PlikShare: v1.1.1
entry.content:
Changes: - [FIX] Explorer tree view folders are being correctly prefetched now - [FIX] Small entries in zip repos download edge-case (breaking download in some rare scenarios) fixed

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damian-krychowski/plikshare/compare/v.1.1.0...v1.1.1

entry.title: New release for PlikShare: v1.1.2
entry.content:
Changes:

  • [FIX] access key is obfuscated on the list of storages
  • [FIX] when storage is created dashboard cache is invalidated
  • [FIX] when workspace name is changed workspace cache is invalidated

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damian-krychowski/plikshare/compare/v1.1.1...v1.1.2

entry.title: New release for PlikShare: v1.1.3
entry.content:
Changes: - [SECURITY-FIX] Antiforgery token mechanism introduced (CSRF attacks prevention)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damian-krychowski/plikshare/compare/v1.1.2...v1.1.3

entry.title: New release for PlikShare: v1.1.4
entry.content:
Changes: - [FEATURE] Additional sign-up checkboxes can be configured (required or optional) in the General Settings page - [FIX] Bulk upload works correctly for archives that contain files only (no folders)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damian-krychowski/plikshare/compare/v1.1.3...v1.1.4
